pr_title: KEYCLOAK-8836 Add test to check product name on welcome page

timeline.bodyText: Not sure this is the best way to identify if it's RHSSO or Keycloak.
timeline.author: stianst

replies.bodyText: Do we have a way to get profile information on the test side?
replies.author: stianst

replies.bodyText: @stianst I don't know of a better approach (and I use it myself like that too :D).
replies.author: vmuzikar
